iana.encoding_considerations:
RTF allows one to include files that reside on a local disk.  Use of
  this is forbidden.  All images must be inline.

  RTF uses only 7 bits per octet.

  RTF specifies it's own character set internally, thus character set
  codes are redundant.
iana.security_considerations:
RTF does not contain a method of writing data to a users filesystem,
  thus it is a safe method of transmitting files.
iana.template_text:
From lindner&mudhoney.micro.umn.edu Tue Jun  8 12:44:30 1993
From: lindner&mudhoney.micro.umn.edu (Paul Lindner)
Subject: Registration of new MIME content-type/subtype
To: iana&ISI.EDU
Date: Tue, 8 Jun 93 14:44:18 CDT
Cc: gopher&boombox.micro.umn.edu (Team Gopher),
        info-metamail&thumper.bellcore.com
Reply-To: lindner&boombox.micro.umn.edu
Content-Length: 950
Status: RO
X-Lines: 32

MIME type name: text
MIME subtype name: rtf

Required parameters: none

Optional paramters: none

Encoding Considerations:

  RTF allows one to include files that reside on a local disk.  Use of
  this is forbidden.  All images must be inline.

  RTF uses only 7 bits per octet.

  RTF specifies it's own character set internally, thus character set
  codes are redundant.

Security Considerations:

  RTF does not contain a method of writing data to a users filesystem,
  thus it is a safe method of transmitting files.

Published Specification:

  ftp://indri.primate.wisc.edu/pub/RTF/RTF-Spec.rtf or
  ftp://indri.primate.wisc.edu/pub/RTF/RTF-Spec.hqx

 | Gophermaster | University of Minnesota         | of comparison.
